attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You read about politicians recieving large salaries and wonder what they do to justify such sums when it could be put to a much better use in the community,I should like to see M.P.'s recieving a normal sized salary, about 32k per annum,a halls of residence set up in london for M.P.'s needed in the capital overnight and further expenses to be strictly examined before paying out.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses and salaries are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
